name: Stella Fantasy
storyline: You are invited to the world of Stella Fantasy. Sourrounded by a field of uknown asteroids, the energy source of all life forms, Mana, flows and creates dimensional gates called Abyss Rift. Team up with your friends to explore Abyss Rift and develop your own multiverse.
summary: Conquer the Abyss Rifts, hunt, gather, craft, and fight in an anime-inspired world. Build and trade NFTs. Team up with friends in vibrant ARPG gameplay.
